text: Abiskoa is a monotypic genus of dwarf spiders containing the single species, Abiskoa abiskoensis. It was first described by Michael I. Saaristo & A. V. Tanasevitch in 2000, and has only been found in Europe, East Asia, and China. ==See also== * List of Linyphiidae species ==References== Category:Linyphiidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Taxa named by Michael Saaristo
title: Abiskoa
